enb_long_title: First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Long-term Cooperative Action under the Convention (AWGLCA 1) and Fifth session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol to the UNFCCC (AWG 5)
sentences: At COP 10 , held from 6 to 17 December 2004 in Buenos Aires, Argentina, parties began informal negotiations on the complex and sensitive issue of the post-2012 period.
As a result of these discussions, a seminar was held in Bonn in May 2005 to address some of the broader issues facing the climate change process.
